name: Math Max
description:
Math Max is like "P90X workout exercise" for your brain! What you need to do is answer endlessly simple math questions, with each you have a limited time to complete. The quicker you choose the right answer, the better score for that question you'll get. Tap a wrong answer once and you'll lose the game.

Math Max has simple gameplay and user interface but you'll be amazed by how much fun it will bring. Try to gain high score as possible and compete with friends, this may help you respond faster and more precisely in the real life!

Thank you for stopping by. Hope you'll enjoy the game ;)
